name: .FGL File Extension
summary: Learn about .FGL files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Source code file written in the Fifth Generation Language, also known as Open5g; designed as an open-source programming language for developing Web applications, but can also be used to create standalone programs.

content: NOTE: The Open5g language is not related to the Open5G fiber-optic network management company.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
